resources.string: Welcome to OK, Smartypants! \n\nGet ready to test your knowledge, then challenge your friends to see who is the biggest smartypants!

How to play OK, Smartypants: 

There are (3) types of questions: multiple choice, pick-the-best, & type-an-answer. 

Multiple choice questions have from 1 to 4 correct answers; you must select ALL the correct answers. For pick-the-best-answer questions, select a single, BEST answer. Type-an-answer questions require you to type in a 1-word answer, then hit 'Done'.


When you've selected or typed your answer(s), press the 'Confirm Answer!' button. 

If you're not sure of the answer, you can press the 'Skip...' button and come back to it later.
